Articles.Content:
Turns extremely smoothly and is consistently stable in flight. This jet is quite easily the most versatile multi role I've made, and the two engine 300 m/s jet has a huge fuel load of over 2000 units to accompany it. 

The speed brakes also decelerate the low drag design very quickly, and it's very responsive on landing approaches with both the airbrakes extended. This is a joy to fly, and it has a camera sensor in the nose.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/p3wqqmolnqp4jrj/F-4X_2.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/p3wqqmolnqp4jrj/F-4X_2.craft?dl=0)
